column5: Fishing Blackstone lake in September, anyone have a lake map with depths?
Fishingoutposts.com. There's a map on that site that shows the depth.
It's on the Navionics Web App as well. Not sure if you can get into Lake St.Joseph or not. I fished the in-flow from Blackstone, but never went up past that.

One is not supposed to go into Lake St. Joe's from Blackstone. There are huge signs at the entrance to Johnstone Bay and Root Bay stating that it is prohibited. Not sure why you would need to anyway as the fishing at Blackstone is fantastic.
